data.md:MetaData: (Table 2, page 155), Rare-earth element, Fe, Mn, Sr, and Rb elemental data, and Rb-Sr isotope data for the HCL-soluble part of Fe-Mn micronodules from the Alpha Ridge, Central Arctic Ocean
Geochemical constraints on the formation of Late Cenozoic ferromanganese micronodules from the central Arctic Ocean
